questions.question: I accidentally authorized the wrong pump. What happens?
questions.response: The authorization times out if you don't start fuelling at the authorized pump within 30 seconds. You will not be charged.

questions.question: Can I get a car wash while fuelling with the app?
questions.response: Not at this time, but we're always working toward adding new features to the app. You can buy a car wash online, using the pump to fuel, or in-store.

questions.question: Can I use my Fuel Savings Card or (FSR) Preferred Price Card (PPC) with mobile payment?
questions.response: Not at this time, but we're always working toward adding new features to the app. You can still use your FSR or PPC using the pump directly, or in-store.

questions.question: What types of payment are accepted through the app?
questions.response:
You can use Google Pay and Visa, MasterCard or AMEX credit cards. We can’t accept debit at this time. 

If you’re having trouble with your payment type, contact your financial institution for assistance.

questions.question: Can I redeem my points using the App?
questions.response: Yes, you can redeem for some of our eGift cards directly in the app. For our other rewards you need to go in store or to our website to redeem your points. Stay tuned to future releases for more of your favourite rewards in the app.

questions.question: How do I add my partner card to my Petro-Points account (i.e. CAA, Hudsons Bay Rewards)?
questions.response: Soon you’ll be able to reload your cards in the App, but for now please visit petro-points.com.

questions.question: How do I scan my Petro-Points barcode in the app?
questions.response:
You can always access your Petro-Points card from the HOME screen of our App.

Simply tap the SCAN CARD button and our attendants will scan your card in-store.

If the barcode doesn’t work, try swiping up to access an alternate version of the barcode.

questions.question: How do I reload my Fuel Savings Reward, Wash & Go or Season Pass card?
questions.response: Soon you’ll be able to reload your card in the app, but for now please visit petro-points.com
